name: Academia Aletheias
description:
A delusion is made up from three criteria*

  • certainty 
  • incorrigibility 
  • falsity of content

*Jaspers, Karl (1997). General Psychopathology. 1. Baltimore: Johns Hopkins University Press.

According to the pure nature of falsity the definition of knowledge or ignorance or even delusion may be a question of the perspective.
